alert.note: Alert for Shelby; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 9:12AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Poinsett, southwestern Mississippi, Crittenden, southwestern Tipton and central Shelby Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 911 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lepanto to Tyronza to near Earle. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Memphis, Marion, Osceola, Marked Tree, Earle, Lepanto, Wilson, Tyronza, Keiser, Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, Memphis, Joiner, Crawfordsville, Dyess, Sunset, Gilmore, Bassett, Jericho, Jennette and Marie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
